description: The former Marine Headquarters, located in Paradise. The site of the great war to rescue Portgas D. Ace from execution.

keyEvents.title: Sengoku Reveals Luffy is Dragon's Son
keyEvents.description: At Marineford, Fleet Admiral Sengoku publicly reveals to the world that Luffy is the son of Revolutionary Dragon, shocking everyone present and watching the broadcast.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most significant revelations in One Piece history occurs at Marineford, changing how the world perceives Luffy.

keyEvents.title: Whitebeard Orders Protection of Luffy
keyEvents.description: Impressed by Luffy's determination to save Ace, Whitebeard orders his crew at Marineford to protect Luffy and ensure no harm comes to him.
keyEvents.significance: Marks a crucial alliance between Whitebeard and Luffy in the battle at Marineford.

description: An archipelago near the Red Line where people gather to watch the broadcast of the Battle of Marineford via visual Den Den Mushi.

keyEvents.title: Sabaody Reacts to Luffy's Heritage Reveal
keyEvents.description: People watching the Marineford broadcast at Sabaody Archipelago are shocked to learn that Luffy is the son of Revolutionary Dragon.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the worldwide impact of Sengoku's revelation about Luffy's parentage.

statusHistory.reason: Location is active during this episode
